response.original_title: Muse: Royal Albert Hall (Teenage Cancer Trust) 2008
response.overview: Muse had originally been approached by TCT concert organiser Roger Daltrey of The Who a "few" years beforehand, after performing at the same unspecified festival, which Dominic Howard later thought was Belgian. This festival may have been Rock Werchter 2006. Due to other obligations, Muse were unable to participate until 2008, when Daltry asked Muse again to play the event.
response.title: Muse: Royal Albert Hall (Teenage Cancer Trust) 2008
